title.native: ふたりはプリキュア Max Heart

description:
Shortly after the fall of the Wicked King, the Queen of the Garden of Light lost her memory and came to Earth, in the form of a 12-year-old girl named Hikari Kujou. Now, she - with the help of Nagisa and Honoka, endowed with new costumes and powers - must find the 12 Heartiels, which hold the key to restoring the Queen's lost memories. For together once again, they are Pretty Cure.

(Source: AniDB)
synonyms: We Are Pretty Cure: Max Heart

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Lacrosse
tags.description: A team game played with a ball and lacrosse sticks.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東堂いづみ) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izumi_Todo)

Izumi Toudou is a collective pseudonym for [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s staff.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/naokisato_face) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1hlpldRj6GZ2naD4XDqi80)

Naoki Sato is a Japanese composer and producer who has provided the music for several popular anime series. He was born on May 2, 1970 and graduated in Chiba Prefecture and Tokyo College of Music. At the 29th Japanese Academy Awards in 2006, he won the Best Music prize for his work on the film Always Sanchōme no Yuhi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jetikariya50)

Acknowledged internationally for his work on [Yu☆Gi☆Oh!](https://anilist.co/anime/481/) and [Death Note](https://anilist.co/anime/1535/).

Famous for his depictions of fingers and the "Joey Chin" in Yu-Gi-Oh!.
Yuriko Kado is a director and storyboard artist.
Takao Iwai is an anime director.

Director who started off as an animator. Still animates on occasions.

Married to [Sayo Aoi](https://anilist.co/staff/118784/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/行信三)

Affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) since the early '80s.

Married to [Yukie Yuki](https://anilist.co/staff/135806/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/行信三)

Affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) since the early '80s.

Married to [Yukie Yuki](https://anilist.co/staff/135806/).
